redirectionError.title: Please follow the new location
redirectionError.subtitle: We encountered a redirection issue while processing your request. Please check the URL or try again later.
clientError.title: Request could not be completed
clientError.subtitle: There was a problem with your request. Please check the details and try again or contact support if the issue persists.
serverError.title: System encountered an unexpected issue
serverError.subtitle: We're experiencing server issues at the moment. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
pageNotFoundError.title: Oops! This page isn’t available
pageNotFoundError.subtitle: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. Please try again or reach out to an administrator if the problem persists.
emptySection.title: No data is available!

validationMessage.required: This field is required. Please make sure to fill it in.
validationMessage.email: Invalid email format. Please provide a valid email.
validationMessage.url: Invalid URL format. Please provide a valid URL.
validationMessage.wrongPassword: Sorry, the password you entered is incorrect. Double-check and try again.
validationMessage.maxCharacters: Please enter a maximum of {num} characters.
validationMessage.minCharacters: Please enter a Minimum of {num} characters long.
validationMessage.matches: The password you entered did not match.
validationMessage.invalidImageType: Invalid file type. Only image files are allowed.
validationMessage.invalidIP: Invalid IP address format. Please provide a valid IP.
validationMessage.invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format! Please upload a file in {format} format.
validationMessage.positiveNumber: Please enter a valid positive number without any signs or decimal.
2fa.errorMessage: There was an error enabling Two-Factor Authentication. Please try again.
2fa.successMessage: You have successfully enabled an extra layer of security with (2FA).
2fa.stepOne.title: Install Google Authenticator App
2fa.stepOne.subtitle: To enable 2FA, you'll need the Google Authenticator App. You can download it from the App Store or Google PlayStore.
2fa.stepTwo.title: Scan the QR Code
2fa.stepTwo.subtitle: Use your phone's camera to scan the QR Code below. If scanning isn't an option, you can manually input the key into your app.
2fa.stepThree.title: Scan the QR Code
2fa.stepThree.subtitle: Please input the 6-digit verification code displayed on your Google Authenticator app to finalize the process and activate 2FA.

page.accessSettings.subtitle: Easily customize and manage your login methods, registration options, and account security settings preferences.
accessSettings.alert.message: Any changes made via switches to your access settings are automatically saved instantly.
switch.emailConfirmation.title: Disable login without confirmation
switch.emailConfirmation.subtitle: If enabled, users will not be able to login until they confirm their email addresses to enhance account security.
switch.passwordLess.title: Signup & Login without passwords
switch.passwordLess.subtitle: If enabled, users will be able to signup and login without the need for passwords, enhancing both convenience and security.
switch.registrationActive.title: Available to user registration
switch.registrationActive.subtitle: If enabled, users will have the ability to complete their registration quickly and effortlessly, providing a smooth.
switch.facebookLogin.title: Social media login with Facebook
switch.facebookLogin.subtitle: If enabled, users will be able to login using their Facebook account, providing a faster sign-in experience.
switch.googleLogin.title: Social media login with Google
switch.googleLogin.subtitle: If enabled, users will be able to login using their Google account, providing a faster sign-in experience.
switch.enableLoginRecaptcha.title: Enable reCAPTCHA for login
switch.enableLoginRecaptcha.subtitle: If enabled, Google reCAPTCHA will provide an extra layer of security during login, protecting users from automated threats.
switch.enableRegisterRecaptcha.title: Enable reCAPTCHA for register
switch.enableRegisterRecaptcha.subtitle: If enabled, Google reCAPTCHA will provide an extra layer of security during register, protecting users from automated threats.
